farmtweaks.midnightconfig.title: FarmTweaks
farmtweaks.midnightconfig.allowAlternate:
Whether or not players can use the Interact key to harvest crops. 
Harvesting this way will replant crops automatically.
farmtweaks.midnightconfig.allowFarmlandT: Whether or not Entities can trample farmland.
farmtweaks.midnightconfig.allowGrassRepl:
Whether or not players can convert dirt into grass using seeds. Different Dirt Types convert to different grass types. 

§8Usable Seeds can be modified using a datapack.
farmtweaks.midnightconfig.cropExperience: The chance of crops dropping experience when harvested.
farmtweaks.midnightconfig.enhancedBoneme: Whether or not more plants should be bonemealable. Certain blocks can be disabled by adding them to the 'Non-Bonemealable Blocks'
farmtweaks.midnightconfig.dispensableIte: Items that can be placed using a dispenser. Can be updated by reloading the world.
farmtweaks.midnightconfig.harvestableBlo:
Blocks that can be harvested using the alternate hoe use. 
§cThis only works with blocks that support the §nage§c state!
